/usr/local/easybuild_allnodes/software/CUDA/12.2.0/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  "--generate-code=arch=compute_75,code=[compute_75,sm_75]" "--generate-code=arch=compute_90,code=[compute_90,sm_90]" -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink --options-file CMakeFiles/gpu_sort_bench.dir/deviceObjects1.rsp -o CMakeFiles/gpu_sort_bench.dir/cmake_device_link.o --options-file CMakeFiles/gpu_sort_bench.dir/deviceLinkLibs.rsp -L"/usr/local/easybuild_allnodes/software/CUDA/12.2.0/lib"
